reviews.review: This game is too good. No matter what type of game is your favorite, you will most definitely enjoy this game. I sure as heck did.

Incredible game which everyone needs to buy and if you haven't bought this game or portal, buy the portal bundle and experience portal 2's incredible puzzles, story, new game play mechanics and good multiplayer.
Overall this game is 10/10 it takes the original portal formula and improves on it and adds more to it.
Fun to play with friends, along with a well written plot.

Do you have friend? Do you and friend play game? Then buy this game. It's that good. I need no more info than a positive answers to those two questions. You'll have a good time.

Do you not have friend? Do you play game? Then buy this game. See reasoning above.

Nunca jugu√© a Portal y prob√© directamente con Portal 2. Para quienes no estemos familiarizados con este juego, lo m√°s normal es que se vaya bastante m√°s all√° de las 10 horas. Y no pasa nada: no desesper√©is por haber le√≠do que el juego se termina en 6 u 8 horas. 

Los puzzles no son f√°ciles, pero tampoco frustrantes. Una vez uno se familiariza con las mec√°nicas del juego, se habit√∫a a trazar planes tentativos para solucionar cada puzzle. Los primeros minutos, para alguien que no est√© familiarizado con Portal, pueden desorientar un poco. La mec√°nica fundamental del juego, basada en teletransportarse a trav√©s de dos portales, es contraintuitiva, y puede llevar un poco habituarse visualizar d√≥nde nos encontramos.

Los puzzles son maravillosos, pero tambi√©n lo es la historia, las voces, la m√∫sica y el maravilloso humor que destila el juego, lo cual hace de Portal 2 m√°s que un gran juego de puzzles.

Es un cl√°sico atemporal.

Absolute classic! Both single-player and multi-player stories are fun. The dialogue is witty and the puzzles are satisfying.

Such a fun game this one is, it's a wild ride for sure, so much to do, it's truly a gamer-changing experience to play for the first time, the lore is very interesting and the developers execute story-telling so damn well, the mechanics are awesome, and the gameplay is just superb.

genuinely recommend this.
